alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 7:49PM MST until March 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. General snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected, however localized snowbands extending southwest through northeast across the greater I-25 corridor region will likely bring locally higher amounts of snow. Snowfall within these localized snowbands may be intense for a period of time. * WHERE...Greater I-25 corridor region from south of Walsenburg to Monument Hill and eastern Fremont county. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
